name: Robo Soldier
description:
Robo Soldier's Story

Jonathan is tasked with Delta team on a mission to find the person behind the organization's chaos. Destroy the plan to create a robot
Can Jonathan be able to deal with this?

Jonathan (Main Character) : He is a person of prudence and patience and low chance of mission failed. In the past he was Delta team

Docter (Enemy) : In the past he was besties and co-worker with Jonathan but he was found that he was build the dangerous robot. After that he escaped and make a plan to destroy Delta team.

Delta team : They are special team that build for doing secret mission. And this team was once Jonathan's team was member. But the HQ make him leave to you a very special mission.

How to control?

W = Walk  forward.

S = Walk backward.

A = Walk left.

D = Walk right.

Rotate Camera by mouse rotation

Left click = Attack
